languages.text: Targets of the webbers must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a –10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.
languages.original_text: Increases the difficulty check for immobilization by a webber by 10.

traits.locale_text: The targets of the webbers have to pass an Agility resistance test with a –10 penalty.

languages.text: Los objetivos de los lanzarredes deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de –10 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizados{/g}.
languages.original_text: Targets of the webbers must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a –10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Los objetivos de los lanzarredes deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de –10 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizados{/g}.

languages.text: ウェバーのターゲットは、-10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければ、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる。
languages.original_text: Targets of the webbers must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a –10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ウェバーのターゲットは、-10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}に成功しなければ、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる。

languages.text: 捕网枪的攻击目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态。
languages.original_text: Targets of the webbers must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a –10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 捕网枪的攻击目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态。

languages.text: Ziele der Netzwerfer werden im Falle einer misslungenen {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -10 {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g}.
languages.original_text: Targets of the webbers must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a –10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Ziele der Netzwerfer werden im Falle einer misslungenen {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -10 {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g}.

languages.text: Les cibles des lance-toiles doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de –10. En cas d'échec, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}.
languages.original_text: Targets of the webbers must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a –10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les cibles des lance-toiles doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de –10. En cas d'échec, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}.

languages.text: Цели сетемета совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} –10 и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижены{/g}.
languages.original_text: Targets of the webbers must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a –10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Цели сетемета совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} –10 и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижены{/g}.

Цели сетемета совершают проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} –10 и в случае провала оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижены{/g}.

languages.text: Ağdolayanların hedefleri, -10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmek zorundadır. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} olurlar.
